subject: The World Bank, United Nations
body:
The World Bank, United Nations and Paris Club introduced this payment arrangement as to enable our Contract ,Winning Prize,inheritance beneficiary to receive their fund without any interference. the ATM VISA Card was contracted and powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE.
The ATM VISA CARD is credited with the sum of $5,500,000.00 USD(Five Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars), it is already loaded in the Master Card which you can use to access your fund in any ATM Stand/location worldwide and remember that the maximum daily withdrawal limit is Ten Thousand United States Dollars(US$10,000.00)we have concluded delivery arrangement with the below courier services companies and their delivery time is stated below.
UPS=3hrs/$50
IMF =4hrs/$30
DHL=6hrs/$20
Note that you will be liable to pay the delivery fee of your ATM VISA Card with any of the above courier company of your choice before the delivery will take place to your destination address
.

subject: Re: The World Bank, United Nations
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this ATM VISA Card powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE. I'm curious, how does this system work exactly? And why was it introduced by the World Bank, United Nations and Paris Club?

Also, could you please provide more details about the delivery process? How much is the delivery fee and what are the payment methods available?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: The World Bank, United Nations
body:
Thank you for your email and prompt response,your questions are well noted,
firstly the ATM card is as a result of your compensation funds from United
Nations and IMF, it will be delivered to your doorstep once you meet up
with the delivery requirements,the options for the delivery are as follows.

DHL: $175

UPS: $125

FedEx: $150

You have to make your choice now and get back to us as soon as possible so
we can register your parcel and it will get to you before the next 24hrs,I
I wait to hear from you.
Best Regards
John

subject: Re: The World Bank, United Nations
body:
Hello John,

Thank you for your quick response. It's exciting to hear about the ATM card from United Nations and IMF. I'm curious, how did I become eligible for this? Also, could you please elaborate more on the delivery options?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George

body: Read my previous email carefully and get answers to your questions

subject: Re: The World Bank, United Nations
body:

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
